statement.p: A floor plan has a \displaystyle{44} : 1 scale. On the drawing, one of the rooms measures \displaystyle{1}\displaystyle\frac{{5}}{{8}}" by \displaystyle{1}\displaystyle\frac{{7}}{{8}}". Show answers to the nearest .01 The actual dimensions would be: Preview Question 1 Part 1 of 3 feet by: Preview Question 1 Part 2 of 3 feet. The area of the room would be Preview Question 1 Part 3 of 3 square feet.
